Package name.pehl.gwt.piriti.rebind

Interface Summary
FieldHandler Interface for generating code for one field assignment.
 

Class Summary
AbstractFieldHandler Base class for all FieldHandlers which contains common code.
ArrayFieldHandler FieldHandler for arrays.
CollectionFieldHandler FieldHandler for collections.
DefaultFieldHandler Default implementation for a FieldHandler.
EnumFieldHandler FieldHandler for enum types.
FieldContext Class which contains information needed to generate code for the XPath evaluation, conversion and assignment of a field.
FieldHandlerRegistry Registry which maps classnames to FieldHandlers.
IndentedWriter Pleasant wrapper for PrintWriter, manages indentation levels.
StringFieldHandler Simple FieldHandler implementation for strings.
TypeUtils Utility methods for JTypes.
XmlReaderCreator Class which generates all code necessary to map all annotated fields.
XmlReaderGenerator GWT Generator for XmlReaders.
XmlRegistryFieldHandler FieldHandler implementation for types with an own XmlReader.
